entry.title: Saturday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h this afternoon. High minus 7. Wind chill near minus 18. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Cloudy. Temperature rising to minus 4 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Fog patches overnight. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Temperature rising to minus 4 by morning. Wind chill minus 17 this evening and minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Saturday 14 January 2023
